Class StandardCategory

java.lang.Object
fr.vinvin129.budgetmanager.budgetLogic.categories.Category
fr.vinvin129.budgetmanager.budgetLogic.categories.StandardCategory
public class StandardCategory extends Category
a temporary model to update a CategoryMoment immutable model for standard category
